data.name: The Persistence: Digital Bonus Content
data.detailed_description:
This Digital Bonus Content package contains a fully remastered game soundtrack and digital artbook featuring conceptual designs of the game's architecture, technology and creatures.

The 25 minute soundtrack features the atmospheric and haunting soundscapes created for The Persistence, themed around the environments, creatures and the story. The digital artbook showcases the early conceptual art and visual design of the 26th century depicted in The Persistence with a look at the technology, architecture and the creatures.

Content does require the purchase of The Persistence game on this platform.
